scenario: In 2025, Alice has wages of $111,065.34. Alice also has an interest in a passive activity which generated a loss of $38,246.27 for the year. Alice has passive income from another source of $4,041.44.
question: Calculate the amount of the passive activity loss that is deductible in 2025 under I.R.C. § 469(a).
answer_explanation: Passive losses are limited to passive income. With $4,041.44 in passive income, only $4,041.44 of the $38,246.27 loss is deductible.
reasoning: Limited passive loss to passive income.
